Text.Page: I came to Kanstria to seek help constructing the weapon for my hushangâ€”my coming-of-age ceremony. Unfortunately, the argons arrived at the same time.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Can I help?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
What I really need are iteris shards. It's an unusual step to take. Most hushang weapons are ceremonial, not functional. I want mine to be different.

Whoa! I can feel the shard's power.

My friend, {@LinkCreature:76#1022}, is skilled at infusing iteris shards with weaponry. I'll seek her help next.

Thank you, .
